trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_SEQ_00<tab>Zukin knows the way to a Confederate's heart.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the Kojin pickles to Confederates at the Coral Banquet.

TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_ZUKIN_000_000<tab>The key to a man's heart is through his stomach, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. With this in mind, I would ask your help in maintaining an important partnership.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_ZUKIN_000_001<tab>I have here two pots of our finest pickles, which I would gift to the sentries at the Coral Banquet. Pray see to it they are delivered.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RIKUFU_000_010<tab>You are far from home, adventurer. What business have you here?
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RIKUFU_000_011<tab>Hah, if it isn't Kojin pickles! I had been looking forward to this! My thanks, friend!
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RIKUFU_000_012<tab>Zukin has been sending us pickles on a regular basis. They bring much welcomed flavor to an otherwise bland day.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_MIDROVER02984_000_013<tab>If you require something, please make it quick. I'm on patrol.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_MIDROVER02984_000_014<tab>Well now, more pickles from the Kojin! There's been more contact between us of late, and I must say I appreciate these little gestures.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_MIDROVER02984_000_015<tab>Please send them my thanks along with this message: should we turn up aught of note, they'll be the first to know.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_MIDROVER02984_000_016<tab>Now, if you'll excuse me, I must be moving along.
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RUGAROVER02984_000_017<tab>You better have a good reason for distractin' me on watch! Might be as I drink hard, but I work hard as well! <hic>
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RUGAROVER02984_000_018<tab>Oh, shite, pickles from the Kojin!? You're a good sort, adventurer! A bloody good sort! <hic>
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RUGAROVER02984_000_019<tab>Let me tell you, these pickles and rice wine are a match made in heaven! Gah, this watch can't end soon enough! <hic>
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_RUGAROVER02984_000_020<tab>Oh, I know─I'll move quicker! That way the watch'll end sooner! Haha, what a bloody brilliant idea! <hic>
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_ZUKIN_000_030<tab>Delivered the pickles, have you? Tell me, how did our Confederate friends respond?
TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_ZUKIN_000_031<tab>...So we continue to be held in good standing. That is well. A little kindness indeed goes a long way.

TEXT_BANKJN306_02984_ZUKIN_000_032<tab>In the past, we Kojin would purchase such treasures as the Confederacy seized in lieu of the Ruby Tithe. By maintaining amicable relations, we have first pick of the merchandise. A fine arrangement, I'm sure you'll agree.
